h1: How Many Calories in a Green Apple?

disclaimer: Nutrition varies by apple size, variety, ripeness, and growing conditions. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A medium green apple has about 80 kcal and 4 g fiber.

faqs.q: How many calories is in a green apple?
faqs.a: About 80 kcal for one medium green apple.

faqs.q: What's the fiber content in a green apple?
faqs.a: Around 4 g of dietary fiber per medium apple.

faqs.q: Are green apples lower in calories than red?
faqs.a: Similar; both ~80 kcal per medium apple, but green may have slightly less sugar.

faqs.q: How much sugar in a green apple?
faqs.a: Approximately 16 g of natural sugars per medium apple.
